page.title: 10 SHOPS
page.content: In June our Job Centre told us that out of a population of 6210,the unemployed are 529 men and 292 women. Our shops provide many jobs.One of the {chemists}employs seven people.He sells medicines,toiletries and health foods. It is a 19th century building,{ {modernised}with screens for spotting shop lifters and a machine for ordering drugs for prompt delivery.A { {baker's} 60 year old shop,produces pies and pasties in a partly mechanised bakery and employs 20 people.The nearby{hairdresser's}shop was only built 7 years ago and employs 13 people.It is a unisex salon with special facilities for the disabled. The perfumes of the lotions,sprays, conditioners and lacquers are fascinating.Leather belts, handbags, shoes and jewellery are sold.They perm,blow_dry,and roller_set hair.
